5 #include "../include/qt_filter_tester/point_cloud_ray_trace.hpp"

7 RayTraceLoader::RayTraceLoader(pcl::PolygonMesh mesh, std::string mesh_name) : RayTraceLoader(mesh_name) {
8  this->mesh = mesh;
9 }
10 
11 RayTraceLoader::RayTraceLoader(std::string mesh_name) {
12  this->setTesselation_level(1);
13  this->setCloudResolution(960);
14  this->setPath(ros::package::getPath("qt_filter_tester") + "/trace_clouds/");
15  this->mesh_name = mesh_name;
16 }
17 
18 void RayTraceLoader::populateLoader() {
19  if(!this->loadPointClouds()) {
20  if(this->mesh.cloud.data.size() == 0) {
21  ROS_ERROR("There is no defined mesh to generate clouds from");
22  return;
23  }
24  this->generatePointClouds();
25  this->savePointClouds();
26  }
27 }
28 
29 std::vector<RayTraceCloud> RayTraceLoader::getPointClouds(bool load){
30  // Populate the loader if empty
31  if(load && this->ray_trace_clouds.empty()) {
32  this->populateLoader();
33  }
34 
35  return this->ray_trace_clouds;
36 }
37 
38 void RayTraceLoader::generatePointClouds() {
39  // Create mesh object
40  vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> meshVTK;
41  pcl::VTKUtils::convertToVTK(this->mesh, meshVTK);
42 
43  // Set up trace generation
44  ROS_INFO("Generating traces...");
45  ROS_INFO("\033[32m Current settings:");
46  ROS_INFO("\033[32m -mesh_name: %s", this->mesh_name.c_str());
47  ROS_INFO("\033[32m -cloud_resolution: %d", this->cloud_resolution);
48  ROS_INFO("\033[32m -tesselation_level: %d", this->tesselation_level);
49 
50  pcl::visualization::PCLVisualizer generator("Generating traces...",false);
51  generator.addModelFromPolyData (meshVTK, "mesh", 0);
52  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>, Eigen::aligned_allocator<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> > > clouds;
53  std::vector<Eigen::Matrix4f, Eigen::aligned_allocator<Eigen::Matrix4f> > poses;
54  std::vector<float> enthropies;
55 
56  // Generate traces
57  generator.renderViewTesselatedSphere(this->cloud_resolution, this->cloud_resolution, clouds, poses, enthropies, this->tesselation_level);
58 
59  // Generate clouds
60  this->ray_trace_clouds.clear();
61  for(int i =0; i < clouds.size(); i++)
62  {
63  RayTraceCloud cloud;
64  cloud.cloud = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
65  *cloud.cloud = clouds.at(i);
66  cloud.pose = poses.at(i);
67  cloud.enthropy = enthropies.at(i);
68  this->ray_trace_clouds.push_back(cloud);
69  }
70 }
71 
72 bool RayTraceLoader::savePointClouds() {
73  if(this->ray_trace_clouds.empty()){
74  return false;
75  }
76 
77  // Set saving path
78  std::string save_path = this->path + this->mesh_name + "/";
79  ROS_INFO("Saving ray traces");
80  ROS_INFO("\tUsing %s", save_path.c_str());
81 
82  // Generate YAML node
83  YAML::Node clouds;
84  for(int i = 0; i < this->ray_trace_clouds.size(); i++) {
85  RayTraceCloud ray_trace = this->ray_trace_clouds.at(i);
86 
87  std::stringstream filename;
88  filename << this->mesh_name << "_cloud_";
89  filename << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
90  filename << ".pcd";
91  boost::filesystem::create_directories(save_path);
92  pcl::io::savePCDFile(save_path + filename.str(), *ray_trace.cloud);
93 
94  YAML::Node node;
95  node["cloud"] = filename.str();
96  for(int j = 0; j < 16; j++) {
97  node["pose"].push_back(ray_trace.pose(j / 4, j % 4));
98  }
99  node["enthropy"] = ray_trace.enthropy;
100 
101  std::stringstream cloud_node;
102  cloud_node << setfill('0') << setw(4) << (i+1);
103  clouds[cloud_node.str()] = node;
104  }
105 
106  // Saving the YAML node
107  YAML::Emitter out;
108  out << clouds;
109  boost::filesystem::ofstream f(save_path + this->mesh_name + ".yaml");
110  f << out.c_str();
111  ROS_INFO("\033[33mSuccessfully saved %d ray traces", (int)this->ray_trace_clouds.size());
112 }
113 
114 
115 bool RayTraceLoader::loadPointClouds() {
116  // Set the save path
117  std::string save_path = this->path + "/" + this->mesh_name + "/";
118  YAML::Node clouds;
119 
120  // Try to load the files
121  try {
122  ROS_INFO("Loading ray trace clouds...");
123  ROS_INFO("\tUsing %s", save_path.c_str());
124  clouds = YAML::LoadFile(save_path + this->mesh_name + ".yaml");
125  }
126  catch (const std::exception& e) {
127  ROS_INFO("\033[31mFile not found.\033[0m");
128  return false;
129  }
130 
131  int i = 1;
132  std::stringstream cloud_node;
133  cloud_node << setfill('0') << setw(4) << i;
134  this->ray_trace_clouds.clear();
135 
136  // Populate ray_trace_cloud from the YAML node
137  while(clouds[cloud_node.str()]){
138  YAML::Node cloud = clouds[cloud_node.str()];
139  RayTraceCloud ray_trace;
140  ray_trace.cloud = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
141  pcl::io::loadPCDFile(save_path + cloud["cloud"].as<std::string>(), *ray_trace.cloud);
142  for(int x = 0; x < 4; x++) {
143  for(int y = 0; y < 4; y++) {
144  ray_trace.pose(x, y) = cloud["pose"][(int)(x*4 + y)].as<float>();
145  }
146  }
147  ray_trace.enthropy = cloud["enthropy"].as<float>();
148  this->ray_trace_clouds.push_back(ray_trace);
149  cloud_node.clear();
150  cloud_node.str(std::string());
151  cloud_node << setfill('0') << setw(4) << ++i;
152  }
153  ROS_INFO("\033[33mSuccessfully loaded %d ray traces\033[0m", i-1);
154  return true;
155 }
